review.title: “Good”
review.pros: Pros – Great job experience, Great projects, Good work enviroment, Small company values, company vehicle, company phone, company gas card, competitave pay scale
review.cons: Cons – Lots of travel, unrealistic deadlines, poor management, no family values are of any concern, quick toaccuse someone of wrong doing
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Work on overall management and bidding jobs. work all divisions of the company as one not as seperate entitie, and do not take people for granted
